input.sentences: getting to see this band play was a real treat for us .
having a refreshing beer after the show really hit the spot .
these were hanging all over the telephone lines .

output.sentences: It was a real treat to see the band play.
The songs they played were refreshing hits that hit the spots.
No matter how hard we tried, no one could get a picture of the telephone lines hanging.
We all loved to listen to the man playing the guitar.
Afterwards, we went to the deli that makes the best sandwiches.
